attributes.action: Put more restrictions on loans for non essentials.
attributes.additional_details:
People shouldn't be getting into debt for things they don't need.
It is irresponsible for companies to be allowed to give customers the option to buy non essential items/products using loans
attributes.background: Stop allowing people to take loans on non essential purchases.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure what you specifically mean by non-essentials. You could start a new petition setting this out more clearly.
